game.title: StillUnnamed -Alpha Build 0.2.1
game.tags: dual, stick, shooter, iphone, game, free, first, game, text, shoot, guns, ammo, 42, rotation, test, mouse, help
game.instructions: WASD to move. Mouse to aim and fire.
game.longDescription: A top down dual movement shooter. This is my first game and is still in the very early development stages. I'm uploading it to get feedback on how to get the aiming with the mouse working better. Thanks for any feedback!
